mapper.select: SELECT * FROM services AS s INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON s.`userID` = u.`userID` INNER JOIN `servicetype` AS t ON s.`stid` = t.`stid` WHERE s.`userID` = #{userID}
SELECT * FROM services AS s INNER JOIN `user` AS u ON s.`userID` = u.`userID` INNER JOIN `servicetype` AS t ON s.`stid` = t.`stid` WHERE s.`userID` = #{userID} AND s.`serviceID` = #{serviceID}
mapper.update: UPDATE `services` SET recommendBool = #{services.recommendBool}, adminOpinion = #{services.adminOpinion}, shelfState = #{services.shelfState}, auditStatus = #{services.auditStatus} WHERE serviceID = #{services.serviceID}
